page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT - MEN
page.content:
Most job opportunities in the area are in agriculture, transport and the building trade. However a large number of men travel outside the area to find work. A survey of fathers' jobs of the children in Class 1 at Loddiswell School is interesting. Places of work:- Loddiswell Village 0% Locally outside village 17% Travelling locally 13% Travelling widely 17% Kingsbridge 4% Plymouth 13% Torbay 8% Totnes 8% Salcombe 8% At home ( ie on farm) 12%
So it seems that village life does not provide for men a self sufficiency of employment-some commuting has arrived.
